lines.text: What's this ? Who are you ?
Commander for conquest of Earth, from the third planet of the black hole, outer space.
So I was right. You are spacemen.
I admire your deductive processes.
This material can only be space titanium.
Space titanium?
[pause]
You mean it's from outer space?
Uhum...
[and he lights a pipe]
Damn Godzilla... You're mistaken if you think your powers are a match for Mechagodzilla.
When the red moon sets, and the sun rises in the West, two monsters will appear to save the people.
[the fake Godzilla, Mechagodzilla in disguise, strides ominously around the Mount Fuji countryside, as Keisuke, Wagura, and Saeko watch on TV]
When a black mountain appears above the clouds, a monster will arrive and try to destroy the world. The ancient prophecy is coming true.
I would never have guessed... that the monster could be Godzilla!
[Saeko, standing next to Shimizu on the deck of the Coral Queen, hears a faint bubbling noise yonder in the sea]
What's the matter?
I thought I heard Godzilla just now!

[scanning the seascape]
I don't hear anything.
Mm, you're right. But... I could swear that I *did* hear him!
Nami! Nami!
lines.character: Tengan Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family High Priest

lines.text: What's the matter, Grandfather?
lines.character: Nami Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family Princess

lines.text: The monster, as you had prophesied, Godzilla has appeared on the mainland!
lines.character: Tengan Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family High Priest

lines.text: Eh?
lines.character: Nami Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family Princess

lines.text: Only one thing can defeat Godzilla, and that is our own King Caesar! But no one can find the key to unlock the divine monster.
lines.character: Tengan Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family High Priest

lines.text: [kneels down]
O' Godzilla! Destroy the people of Japan, who once tried to conquer the Azumi Tribe! You will be the instrument of our revenge! O' Godzilla!
lines.character: Tengan Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family High Priest

lines.text: [Nami looks on in sadness]
Who are you?
[the henchman doesn't answer]
A spaceman? Where's my brother and the professor? Where are they!
You'll see them soon. Or rather... their corpses!
[the henchman is shot in the hand by Nanbara]
[after Nanbara saves Shimizu's life]
Just who are you?
I'm an Interpol agent. Nanbara.
You've been following me?
Yes. Six months ago, they came to our attention. We threw out a net to find the truth... and you got caught in that net. I've been following you ever since. And that's all there is to the story!
[chuckles]
[last lines]
Finally, the ancestors of the Azumi Royal Family may now sleep in peace.
lines.character: Tengan Kunito, the Azumi Royal Family High Priest

lines.text: [a revived Godzilla rises from the Okinawan shores]
Godzilla is still alive!

[overjoyed]
The other monster the ancient people said would appear... must be Godzilla!
[Shimizu nods]
Do you notice the color of the moon?
